Package dreisoft.tresos.launcher2.api.module

This package provides access to the information registered via the dreisoft.tresos.launcher2.plugin.module extension-point.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    EcuType
    Represents an ecu type of a module (target/derivate).
    ModuleDescription
    This class represents the description of a module registrered via the module extension-point dreisoft.tresos.launcher2.plugin.module.
    ModuleVersion
    Represents module version information (SpecVersion, RelVersion, SwVersion).

Package dreisoft.tresos.launcher2.api.module Description

This package provides access to the information registered via the dreisoft.tresos.launcher2.plugin.module extension-point. This means that with the classes in this package the registered AUTOSAR modules (not the configurations) can be queried.

Module Information

Via the extension-point dreisoft.tresos.launcher2.plugin.module modules are registered as in the following example: 

        <extension point="dreisoft.tresos.launcher2.plugin.module"
                   id="Can_TS_T17D9M2I0R0_ModuleId"
                   name="Can_TS_T17D9M2I0R0 Module">

          <module id="Can_TS_T17D9M2I0R0"
                  label="EBA Can V850ESFX3 2.0.1"
                  mandatory="false"
                  allowMultiple="false"
                  description="AUTOSAR Can module"
                  copyright="(c) 2007 3SOFT"
                  swVersionMajor="2"
                  swVersionMinor="0"
                  swVersionPatch="1"
                  specVersionMajor="2"
                  specVersionMinor="0"
                  specVersionPatch="0"
                  relVersionMinor="2"
                  relVersionMajor="0"
                  relVersionPatch="0"
                  categoryType="Can"
                  categoryLayer="MCAL"
                  categoryCategory="Com"
                  categoryComponent="ECUC">
            <ecuType target="V850" derivate="V850ESFX3"/>
          </module>
        </extension>

Such a registration is represented by the class ModuleDescription which provides access to the fields in the registration: 

        System.err.println( "module id:" + module.getId() );
        System.err.println( "module reVersion*:" + module.getRelVersion() );

Versions are represented by the class ModuleVersion that allows to easily query and compare version: 

        System.err.println( "RelVersionMajor: " module.getRelVersion().getMajor() );
        System.err.println( "Is it a 2.1 module: " + (new ModuleVersion( "2.1.*" )).equals( module.getRelVersion() );

ECUTypes are described by EcuType: 

        System.err.println( "Supported Target: " + module.getEcuTypes().next().getTarget() );
        System.err.println( "Supports V850: " + (new EcuType( "V850" )).equals( module.getEcuTypes() );
